column1: #Text=International row after Spielberg quits 2008 Beijing Olympics
#Text=On Wednesday , United States film director Steven Spielberg withdrew from his position as artistic adviser to the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing , China .
#Text=" Conscience will not allow me to continue with business as usual , " he said .

#Text=" Sudan 's government bears the bulk of the responsibility for these ongoing crimes but the international community , and particularly China , should be doing more to end the continuing human suffering there , " Spielberg 's statement said .

#Text=This does n't mean , however , we should be distracted from the urgency of Darfur .

#Text= China is also concerned about the humanitarian issues there , but we have been playing a positive and constructive role in promoting peace in Darfur , " Liu said , adding that China is working with the United Nations to provide aid and resolve the crisis .

column1: #Text=Critics of China contend that China supports the Islamic regime in Sudan because it buys two-thirds of the country 's oil exports and also sells it weapons .
#Text=Further , China has been defending the government in Khartoum in the United Nations Security Council .
#Text=Since 2003 , fighting between government-backed militia and rebels in Darfur has led to the death of more than 200,000 people and displaced some 2.5 million others .
#Text=Meanwhile , United States President George W. Bush confirmed that he still plans to attend the Games in Beijing .
#Text=" I view the Olympics as a sporting event .
